mapper.select: select * from chatlist l left outer join chatroom r on l.chatidx=r.chatidx left outer join likelist k on k.memidx=l.memidx and k.cridx=l.cridx where l.chatidx=#{chatidx};

select l.chatidx, r.chatcontent, r.chatdate, c.cridx, c.crnick, c.placename, m.memidx, m.memnick, r.chatread from member m join chatlist l on l.memidx=m.memidx join carry c on l.cridx=c.cridx and m.memidx=#{memidx} left outer join chatroom r on l.chatidx=r.chatidx and r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.MESSAGEIDX) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx);

select l.chatidx, r.chatcontent, r.chatdate, c.cridx, c.crnick, c.placename, m.memidx, m.memnick, r.chatread from member m join chatlist l on l.memidx=m.memidx join carry c on l.cridx=c.cridx and c.cridx=#{cridx} left outer join chatroom r on l.chatidx=r.chatidx and r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.MESSAGEIDX) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx);
select cridx, crnick, placename from carry
select chatidx from chatlist where cridx=#{cridx} and memidx=#{memidx}
select count(*) from chatlist where chatidx=#{param}
mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (chatidx, chatcontent, cridx, memidx, contenttype, chatread) values (#{chatidx},#{chatcontent},#{cridx},#{memidx},#{contenttype}, #{chatread})
mapper.update: update chatroom set chatread=2 where chatidx=#{param1}
mapper.select: select * from likelist where memidx=#{param1} and cridx=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into likelist (memidx, cridx, likecheck) values (#{memidx},#{cridx},#{likecheck})
mapper.update: update likelist set likecheck=#{param1} where memidx=#{param2} and cridx=#{param3}
